title: What is the status of the old Wilsons location on New Centre Drive?  It was sold to a church many years ago, but nothing appears to have happened since.  Have the plans of the church changed or is there an updated timeline available?
text:
Here's a link to the answer to your question, an updated version of a previous answer:



http://www.myreporter.com/2012/07/whats-the-status-of-the-church-opening-where-wilsons-used-to-be-near-walmart/
